text: The Khamseh Arabs are an Arab nomadic and pastoral tribe of the Fars Province in Iran. They are a part of Khamseh confederation. They speak a dialect of Arabic. ==Branches== The tribe has two branches: Sheybani and Jabbareh ==Sources== * Ali Mohammad Najafi, Great Men of Arab Tribe and the Tribes * Ali Mohammad Najafi, Khamseh Tribes happenings Category:Ethnic groups in Iran
title: Khamseh Arabs
